meaning: be mixed, get mingled with, join
gaze, look up, respect, fan oneself
get fat, grow fertile / cross over, exceed
get used to, become familiar with
give (the giver is not the speaker)
glare at, keep an eye on
go mad, be out of order
line up, list, arrange in order
make fun of, play jokes on
part, separate from, be divided, divorced
put on top off, put on board
put on, wear (on feet or legs - trousers/shoes etc)
Think of / come into your mind
